content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28, -61)
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61)
- Stone furnace at (-27, -59) with coal fuel and copper plate output
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5) 
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (1, -60)
- Burner mining drill at (1, -60)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5) containing iron ore
- Burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)
- Stone furnace at (2, -56) with coal fuel and iron plate output

### Smelting Array at (1, 1)
- Stone furnace at (1, 1)
- Stone furnace at (3, 1)
- Burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5) and (3.5, 2.5)
- Wooden chests at (1.5, 3.5), (3.5, 3.5), and (5.5, 3.5)
- Burner inserter at (5.5, 2.5)

### Smelting Array at (2, 7)
- Stone furnaces at (2, 7) and (4, 7)
- Burner inserters at (2.5, 8.5) and (4.5, 8.5)
- Wooden chests at (2.5, 9.5) and (4.5, 9.5)
- Burner inserter at (3.5, 9.5)

### Assembly Complex at (14.5, 14.5)
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5) for copper cable production
- Burner inserter at (14.5, 12.5)
- Wooden chest at (14.5, 11.5)
- Connected to electricity network (currently unpowered)

### Assembly Complex at (21.5, 15.5)
- Assembling machine at (21.5, 15.5) for electronic circuit production
- Burner inserter at (21.5, 13.5)
- Wooden chest at (21.5, 11.5) containing iron plates and copper cable
- Connected to electricity network (currently unpowered)

### Power Generation System
- Boiler at (37.5, 19)
- Steam engine at (43.5, 19.5)
- Offshore pumps at (-7.5, 25.5), (2.5, 34.5), and (2.5, 36.5)
- Multiple pipe networks connecting water supply to power generation
- Currently not operational due to incomplete connections

ERROR TIPS

### Power Connection Issues
- Ensure all electrical components are properly connected to power poles
- Power generation system needs complete water pipe connections to function

### Resource Management Issues
- Several burner mining drills are out of fuel - keep coal supplied
- Multiple furnaces show "no ingredients" warnings - ensure proper input connections
- Some inserters are blocked due to full output - add more storage or transport capacity

### Assembly Machine Setup
- Assembly machines require proper power connections to function
- Ensure consistent material supply chains to assembly machines

### Fluid System Issues
- Many pipe segments are not properly connected, creating disconnected fluid networks
- Ensure continuous pipe connections from water sources to consumers
